## compareReleaseSeverity() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Compares two release types and returns which is more severe. Severity order: major &gt; minor &gt; patch &gt; none (most to least severe).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function compareReleaseSeverity(a: ReleaseType | SemanticReleaseType | null, b: ReleaseType | SemanticReleaseType | null): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

a


</td><td>

ReleaseType \| [SemanticReleaseType](./change-detector-semantic-release-plugin.semanticreleasetype.md) \| null


</td><td>

First release type


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

b


</td><td>

ReleaseType \| [SemanticReleaseType](./change-detector-semantic-release-plugin.semanticreleasetype.md) \| null


</td><td>

Second release type


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

Positive if a is more severe, negative if b is more severe, 0 if equal
